widget.header: Justia Wins 2022 LegalTech Breakthrough Award For “Legal Education Innovation of the Year”

config: Last month, Justia was awarded the 2022 LegalTech Breakthrough Award For “Legal Education Innovation of the Year” for our recently launched Justia U.S. Law School Center. Our whole team is very proud of this recognition and looks forward to it serving its purpose of free access to the law with tailored resources for law students. Go Justia!
